text: Aix-en-Diois is a former commune in the Drôme department. It is in southeastern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Solaure-en-Diois.Arrêté préfectoral 18 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in France Category:Communes in Drôme
title: Aix-en-Diois
